title: College Hoops with Duke University's Nina King and NIL chat with Marty Edel
itunes:title: College Hoops with Duke University's Nina King and NIL chat with Marty Edel
description:
Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and guest host Damien Sassower as they chat with Duke University's Director of Athletics, Nina King, a discussion on NIL in college sports with Marty Edel plus family drama at the Baltimore Orioles home. All that and more on the Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
